menuItems.title: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

menuItems.title: Pepperoni Pizza
menuItems.description: A timeless favorite topped with spicy pepperoni slices and cheese.

menuItems.title: Vegetarian Pizza
menuItems.description: Loaded with fresh vegetables like bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms.

menuItems.title: Hawaiian Pizza
menuItems.description: Sweet and savory mix of pineapple, ham, and mozzarella cheese.

menuItems.title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken, onions, and tangy BBQ sauce on a crispy crust.

menuItems.title: Supreme Pizza
menuItems.description: The ultimate combination of meats, veggies, and cheese for pizza lovers.
